author: jpost.com
title: Alleged Israeli airstrikes target southern Syria, Damascus - report - The Jerusalem Post
text:
Alleged Israeli airstrikes targeted sites in southern Syria and near Damascus on Thursday night in two separate waves, according to Syrian reports.
Syria's state news agency SANA reported that Israeli fighter jets conducted airstrikes from over the Golan Heights targeting sites in southern Syria, causing material damage.
The local Suwayda 24 news site reported that a radar site belonging to the Syrian Army at Tal al-Sahn, not far from the Syrian-Jordanian border, was targeted and destroyed in the airstrikes. No injuries were reported in the strike.
Syrian air defenses were activated in the Damascus area as well during the strikes, although it is as of yet unclear what locations in the Damascus area were targeted. An Israeli Air Force F-35 fighter jet flies during an aerial demonstration at a graduation ceremony for Israeli air force pilots (credit: REUTERS/AMIR COHEN)
The Tal al-Sahn site has been targeted repeatedly in the past by alleged Israeli airstrikes.
A few hours after the first wave of airstrikes, a second wave of airstrikes was reported in the Damascus area, with Syrian air defenses activated in response. Recent alleged Israeli airstrikes in Syria
The airstrikes come just days after Razi Mousavi, a senior officer in Iran's Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps (IRGC), was killed in an alleged Israeli airstrike in the Damascus area. Mousavi served as one of the leaders of Iran's efforts in Syria and had been targeted by Israel in the past, according to Iranian media. Advertisement
The airstrikes also come just a day after the Damascus International Airport returned to service after being put out of service by an alleged Israeli airstrike in late November.

author: @infoitscienza
title: Nintendo Switch 2: pre-order già aperti su Amazon!
text:
Nintendo Switch 2: pre-order già aperti su Amazon!
Articolo Precedente
Articolo Successivo
Nel pomeriggio di oggi, con uno speciale Direct di circa un’ora che potete recuperare in questa news, è stata presentata Nintendo Switch 2. Con un po’ di sorpresa però sono stati già aperti i pre-order su Amazon, sia della versione liscia, sia di quella in bundle con Mario Kart World.
Anteprima Prodotto Prezzo Nintendo Switch 2 469,99 EUR
Affrettatevi prima che vadano esaurite!
I prezzi di listino sono piuttosto chiari, anche se hanno lasciato qualche strascico di discussione. (Gametimers)
Ne parlano anche altre testate
Potete affidarvi al nostro riepilogo su tutte le novità del Direct, dai giochi alle caratteristiche speciali della console , per recuperare le informazioni uscite oggi, nel caso non abbiate seguito con attenzione. (Multiplayer)
Tra queste informazioni c'è anche la procedura di preordine della console che, come spiegato nel sito ufficiale, avrà alcune limitazioni. Nintendo Switch 2 è ormai ufficiale e la N ha svelato tutto quello che ci serviva sapere per poter entrare nella nuova generazione di Nintendo. (SpazioGames)
Durante la cerimonia del 2017 il ruolo da protagonista lo interpretò Yoshiaki Koizumi, producer della console, oggi del tutto assente. La presentazione di Nintendo Switch, risalente all'inizio del 2017, era stata molto diversa; all'epoca per la società si trattava, per certi versi, dell'ultima occasione per mantenere intatto il prestigio del proprio nome, dopo il fallimento di Wii U. (Multiplayer)
Tra i più attesi sicuramente Mario Kart World, nuovo capitolo che vede il famoso idraulico gareggiare in tanti circuiti esclusivi in giro per il mondo con i suoi amici di sempre. Con l'uscita della nuova Switch 2, l'azienda di videogiochi giapponese Nintendo ha in programma il rilascio di tanti nuovi titoli. (Il Messaggero)
Nintendo Switch, la console “ibrida” tra portatile e fissa, viene definita anche “inter-generazionale” perché il lungo ciclo di vita – siamo all’ottavo anno abbondante – l’ha portata nella terra di mezzo tra l’ottava e la nona generazione di console. (Corriere della Sera)
Oggi Nintendo ha annunciato che Split Fiction, il gioco cooperativo di Hazelight acclamato dalla critica, arriverà su Nintendo Switch 2 come titolo di lancio! Mio e Zoe arrivano su Nintendo Switch 2. (Nerdmovieproductions)

author: Arun Janardhanan
title: Annamalai calls Jayalalithaa a ‘Hindutva leader’; Sasikala, AIADMK fire back: ‘She had faith in God, no religious beliefs’ | India News - The Indian Express
text: A recent statement by Tamil Nadu BJP leader K Annamalai that the late AIADMK supremo J Jayalalithaa was a “far superior Hindutva leader” has drawn sharp rebukes from her close aide V K Sasikala and AIADMK leader D Jayakumar. Both have condemned Annamalai’s remarks as a gross misrepresentation of the late CM’s secular and inclusive legacy. In a recent interview, Annamalai said, “When Jayalalithaa-ji was alive, she was the far superior leader of Hindutva than anybody in Tamil Nadu.” “When you consider BJP as a party, and Jayalalithaa as a leader, and when both of them co-exist, the natural choice of a Hindu voter would be Jayalalithaa — I am talking about a period before 2014. She used to display her ‘Hinduness’ openly. She may be the first politician in our country, outside BJP, to say that ‘if you don’t build Ram temple in India, are you going to build it in Pakistan’? A lady who brought anti-conversion law in the 2002-03 period, who donated liberally to temples, contested from Srirangam, who took efforts to revive the temple in a big way, getting elephants to major temples. If you look at her activity as a persona, she was a far superior Hindutva leader,” Annamalai said in a video he posted on social media. The remark immediately drew criticism from Sasikala, the close aide of Jayalalithaa who lived with her for about 25 years and actively participated in all major political decisions taken by the AIADMK leader. Sasikala said Jayalalithaa was an “unparalleled Dravidian leader of Tamil Nadu soil. a revolutionary leader, Amma!” She said Annamalai’s statement reveals his ignorance and misunderstanding about Jayalalithaa. “Amma (as Jayalalithaa was called by her followers) had faith in God, but she never had religious beliefs. She was the only unparalleled leader who treated everyone equally throughout her life. I would like to state at this moment that no one can confine such a distinguished leader to any narrow bounds,” Sasikala said. “Amma transcended caste, religion, and divisions, and was revered and admired by people from all walks of life throughout her life.” AIADMK leader D Jayakumar also criticised Annamalai “for defaming Amma by portraying her as a sectarian leader”. “When the Babri Masjid was demolished, violent incidents occurred in many states across the country. It was Amma who ensured Tamil Nadu remained a land of peace without any violence,” said Jayakumar.

author: polishnews
title: Norway. Russian hackers allegedly stole data from almost 150,000 people. Norwegians
text:
Russian hackers took over data from mobile phones belonging to 148,000 Norwegians. The Personal Data Protection Office considered the scale of the incident to be “potentially huge” and the incident could have serious consequences.
The stolen data is said to contain information about the location and movement of mobile phone users. Norwegian television NRK refers to the announcement on a Russian hacker forum. The authors of the entry claim that the information obtained can be assigned to specific subscribers.
Possible serious consequences
Tobias Judin from the Norwegian data protection authority Datatilsynet, quoted by NRK television, admitted that the incident could have serious consequences.
– The scale of theft could potentially be huge. The obtained data may contain sensitive information that can be used to influence and manipulate those concerned, he told Norwegian television journalists.
Read more: 2.4 million hacker attacks per day. “More and more sophisticated” >>>
This is where the data was allegedly stolen
The location data was allegedly stolen from the Norwegian-American company Gravy Analytics. She collected them from applications installed on mobile phones.
In 2024, the US Federal Trade Commission accused the company of illegally trading in data of mobile phone users, containing information about personal relationships, pregnancies, political and religious views of mobile device users. In December, Reuters reported that Gravy Analytics had entered into a contract with the administration Joe Biden a settlement prohibiting the company from collecting location data. Neither NRK nor Reuters journalists received any comment from Gravy Analytics regarding the disclosed data theft.
Main photo source: Shutterstock
Source link
topics: Science and Technology->information technology and computer science

author: Keva York
title: Adam Sandler stars in new Netflix sci-fi drama Spaceman alongside Carey Mulligan and an extraterrestrial spider - ABC News
text:
Adam Sandler is a man who prioritises comfort — this much can be deduced from his perennial preference for dressing in billowy tees, basketball shorts, and sneakers (he finds suits intolerably "itchy") — and this priority has been reflected, more often than not, in his career choices.
For decades, he's been plying variations of the man-child, the wacky savant, the weirdo-naïf. His films are always peopled with the real-life pals he forged all the way back in his SNL days and are often set in luxe tropical locales.
Uncut Gems review: Adam Sandler dazzles in high-anxiety thriller The comedian doubles down on his acting credentials in this propulsive, tragicomic odyssey through New York City's gem district, streaming on Netflix.
Read more
Since 2014, he's been putting out a steady stream of goofy-sweet comedies for Netflix ; comfort viewing for millions cosied up on the couch at home.
There have been notable exceptions: Sandler's performance as compulsive gambler Howard Ratner in Uncut Gems in 2019 was an electrifying left turn on the level of, if not greater than, his first dramatic role, in Paul Thomas Anderson's Punch-Drunk Love (2002).
As lonesome small-fry entrepreneur Barry Egan, Sandler swung between anxious mess and exploding with rage, and proved to the haters — though he didn't owe them anything — that he could do more than funny voices.
Another sad man in space The latest Sandler-Netflix venture — directed by Chernobyl's Johan Renck and based on a book by Jaroslav Kalfar, Spaceman of Bohemia (2017) — represents new territory again for the actor. Although, it must be noted, it's territory that has recently been trod by other big names, including Matthew McConaughey (in Interstellar), Ryan Gosling (in First Man ), and Brad Pitt (in Ad Astra ).
As Jakub Procházka, a Czech astronaut on a solo mission, Sandler joins the ranks of sad men in space, appearing drained of his characteristic geniality and rage alike. (Nor is he doing an accent — sorry folks, Renck doesn't believe in them.)
Sandler wore a harness suspended from wires to create the effect of zero gravity while his character was in space. ( Supplied: Netflix )
Millions of miles from any beach resort or sprawling suburban home or, indeed, from any jokes, Sandler accesses a resolutely hushed, contemplative mode — leaning all the way into the depressive midlife slump he brushed up against in 2022 basketball drama Hustle.
"I used to be able to write these romantic comedies and comedies about people struggling with what they're going to do with their life," Sandler tells ABC Arts. He appears to be in quite a contemplative mood himself on the day we speak, though he's decked out in Miami-hued neons.
"Now, at my age, I'm like, 'what is the struggle that will connect with other people?'"
Sandler also professes a certain suggestibility. "Every time I watch a movie that I could act in, I say, 'Oh shit, I'd like to do something like that'. I get influenced quickly."
It's an endearing and perhaps rare quality for a wildly successful man in his fifties to have — suggestive of a curiosity and capacity for excitement that rhymes with the naiveté of his most iconic characters.
"Carey is the most exquisite actor I've ever worked with. She's so technically perfect and so delightful as a human being," Renck told The Hollywood Reporter. ( Supplied: Netflix )
Jakub's mission in Spaceman is to retrieve a sample of a magenta cloud of space dust, a beautiful but ominous new presence in the sky over Earth. Man and movie alike, however, are far more interested in the mysteries of the human heart than in those of the cosmos.
We meet Jakub six months into his journey, at which point his wife, Lenka (Carey Mulligan), has stopped answering his calls, and the pining astronaut is seeking comfort in the forms of liquor and choc-hazelnut spread.
It's the unexpected appearance aboard the ship of Hanus, a giant, extraterrestrial arachnid voiced by Paul Dano, that shakes Jakub out of his growing stupor.
An unlikely eight-legged friend In a warm monotone, Hanus prods Jakub to consider his relationship with Lenka, from the magic of their first encounter through to its present state of distance and disrepair.
Hanus functions as something like a benevolent, eight-legged Ghost of Christmas Past, nudging Jakub towards the revelation that — at least as far as Lenka is concerned — he's been kind of a Scrooge.
Necessarily acting against a tennis ball for his scenes with Hanus, Sandler speaks fondly of seeing his unlikely companion come to life for the first time.
Film still from Spaceman (2024) featuring Hanus (voice by Paul Dano). ( Supplied: Netflix )
"I saw drawings, so I knew what it was possibly going to look like — but getting to see the movie, and how fluid Hanus is movin' around the ship, and how warm his eyes are, and his little teeth that seem like they could eat corn on the cob …" he says, drifting off, tickled by the mental image.
While Dano recorded Hanus's lines in a darkened room, Sandler's role was a little more physically demanding — again taking the actor out of his comfort zone.
"When I read the script and saw this movie in my head, I was so excited," he says.
"Two weeks before we started shooting, Johan told me, 'Of course, you know this isn't Star Trek — you're not walking around on the ship. There's no gravity.'
"So then I realised that I had to do all these beautiful scenes while floating and having people twist me around.
"The wires and the harness and all that — my body is not meant for that. My body is not meant for a lot of things. But I did it."
Despite these new and trying conditions, Sandler gives a performance that is remarkable in its restraint — all the more so for the way in which it contrasts his public persona.
In Spaceman, the waggish comedian and devoted family man is left without any old friends or loved ones to bounce off or perform for.
Isabella Rossellini appears in Spaceman as Commissioner Tuma, Jakub's commanding officer. ( Supplied: Netflix )
A little bit of that energy, however, would have leavened Spaceman — just a bit of the Adam Sandler seen in, say, Mr Deeds (2002); breaking out into a rendition of Space Oddity while on a private jet, singing into a banana, charming the pilots. But, as Bowie sang (more or less), the star looks very different today.
"The inner peace is here now — I'm calmer," Sandler says.
"There's less screaming in my house."
Spaceman is streaming on Netflix from March 1.
Loading YouTube content Posted 29 Feb 2024 29 Feb 2024 Thu 29 Feb 2024 at 10:16pm

author: DS
title: Horóscopo del viernes, 14 de junio de 2024
text: Secciones Servicios Destacamos DS Jueves, 13 de junio 2024, 23:00 Necesitas ser suscriptor para acceder a esta funcionalidad. Compartir Consulta la predicción astrológica para el 14 de junio de 2024 y descubre qué te deparan los astros para tu signo del zodiaco en áreas cruciales como la salud, el dinero y el amor. El zodiaco es un sistema astrológico que se ha utilizado durante miles de años para predecir eventos y personalidades basadas en la posición de los planetas y las estrellas. Los antiguos babilonios fueron los primeros en desarrollar un sistema zodiacal alrededor del año 400 a.C. Su zodiaco constaba de 12 signos, cada uno asociado con una constelación particular. Los signos eran utilizados para predecir eventos y para determinar el horóscopo personal. Los antiguos griegos adoptaron el zodiaco babilónico, pero lo modificaron alrededor del año 500 a.C. Ellos crearon los 12 signos que conocemos hoy en día, y cada signo fue asociado con una deidad o figura mitológica griega. A lo largo de los siglos, el zodiaco se ha utilizado en diversas culturas para predecir eventos y personalidades. En la astrología occidental, cada signo tiene una serie de características asociadas con él. Aries se asocia con el dios de la guerra griego, Ares. Los nacidos bajo este signo son conocidos por ser valientes, enérgicos y apasionados, pero también pueden ser impulsivos y agresivos. Tauro se asocia con el mito griego de la princesa Europa, quien fue raptada por Zeus en forma de toro. Los nacidos bajo este signo son conocidos por ser tercos y leales, pero también pueden ser posesivos y celosos. Géminis se asocia con los hermanos gemelos Castor y Pólux de la mitología griega. Los nacidos bajo este signo son conocidos por ser comunicativos y versátiles, pero también pueden ser superficiales y cambiantes. Cáncer se asocia con el cangrejo en la mitología griega. Los nacidos bajo este signo son conocidos por ser emocionales y protectores, pero también pueden ser retraídos y susceptibles. Leo se asocia con el león en la mitología griega. Los nacidos bajo este signo son conocidos por ser líderes y generosos, pero también pueden ser arrogantes y dominantes. Virgo se asocia con la diosa griega de la justicia, Astrea. Los nacidos bajo este signo son conocidos por ser prácticos y analíticos, pero también pueden ser críticos y perfeccionistas. Libra se asocia con la diosa griega de la justicia, Temis. Los nacidos bajo este signo son conocidos por ser equilibrados y diplomáticos, pero también pueden ser indecisos y complacientes. Escorpio se asocia con el escorpión en la mitología griega. Los nacidos bajo este signo son conocidos por ser apasionados y misteriosos, pero también pueden ser celosos y controladores. Sagitario se asocia con el centauro mitad hombre y mitad caballo, Quirón. Los nacidos bajo este signo son conocidos por ser aventureros y optimistas, pero también pueden ser imprudentes y arrogantes. Capricornio se asocia con la cabra en la mitología griega. Los nacidos bajo este signo son conocidos por ser ambiciosos y disciplinados, pero también pueden ser fríos y distantes. Acuario se asocia con el portador de agua en la mitología griega. Los nacidos bajo este signo son conocidos por ser originales y humanos. Piscis se asocia con los peces y su historia se remonta a la mitología griega. Se dice que los dioses se transformaron en peces para escapar de la persecución de los titanes. Este signo representa la sensibilidad y la espiritualidad.
